Activity: Arrive at the office, morning routine.
Gather all necessary data for preparing preliminary financial statements, including trading activity, expense reports, and asset valuations.
Begin preparing the preliminary balance sheet, listing all assets, liabilities, and equity accounts.
Prepare the preliminary income statement, detailing all revenues and expenses for the reporting period.
Lunch break. Grab a sandwich and browse news.
Prepare the preliminary statement of cash flows, summarizing all cash inflows and outflows during the reporting period.
Review the preliminary financial statements for accuracy and completeness. Identify any errors or discrepancies and make necessary corrections.
Email @facc-2 (Fund Accountant) to schedule a peer review of the preliminary financial statements. Topic: Peer Review of Preliminary Financial Statements.
